verses.text: Then the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, Now shalt thou \w see|strong="H7200"\w* what I will \w do|strong="H6213"\w* to \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w*: for with a \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall he let them \w go|strong="H7971"\w*, and with a \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall he drive them \w out|strong="H1644"\w* of his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*:\f + \fr 6.2 \ft the \+nd LORD\+nd*: or, \+nd JEHOVAH\+nd*\f*

And I \w appeared|strong="H7200"\w* unto \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, unto \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and unto \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*, by \add the name of\add* \w God|strong="H0410"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*, but by my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \nd \+w JEHOVAH|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was I not \w known|strong="H3045"\w* to them.

And I have also \w established|strong="H6965"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* with them, to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*, the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of their \w pilgrimage|strong="H4033"\w*, wherein they were \w strangers|strong="H1481"\w*.

And I have also \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* the \w groaning|strong="H5009"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w* keep in \w bondage|strong="H5647"\w*; and I have \w remembered|strong="H2142"\w* my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*.

\w Wherefore|strong="H3651"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and I will \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* you out from under the \w burdens|strong="H5450"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*, and I will \w rid|strong="H5337"\w* you out of their \w bondage|strong="H5656"\w*, and I will \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* you with a \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* out \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, and with \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w judgments|strong="H8201"\w*:

And I will \w take|strong="H3947"\w* you to me for a \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and I will be to you a \w God|strong="H0430"\w*: and ye shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which \w bringeth|strong="H3318"\w* you out from under the \w burdens|strong="H5450"\w* of the \w Egyptians|strong="H4714"\w*.

And I will \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* you in unto the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, concerning the which I did \w swear|strong="H5375"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it to \w Abraham|strong="H0085"\w*, to \w Isaac|strong="H3327"\w*, and to \w Jacob|strong="H3290"\w*; and I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* it you for an \w heritage|strong="H4181"\w*: I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.\f + \fr 6.8 \ft swear: Heb. lift up my hand\f*

¶ And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* so unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: but they \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* not unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* for \w anguish|strong="H7115"\w* of \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w*, and for \w cruel|strong="H7186"\w* \w bondage|strong="H5656"\w*.\f + \fr 6.9 \ft anguish: Heb. shortness, or, straitness\f*
And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Go|strong="H0935"\w* in, \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, that he let the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* go \w out|strong="H7971"\w* of his \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* have not \w hearkened|strong="H8085"\w* unto me; how then shall \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w me|strong="H0589"\w*, who \add am\add* of \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*?

And the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and unto \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and gave them a \w charge|strong="H6680"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, to \w bring|strong="H3318"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

¶ These \add be\add* the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of their \w fathers’|strong="H0001"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*: The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w* the \w firstborn|strong="H1060"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; \w Hanoch|strong="H2585"\w*, and \w Pallu|strong="H6396"\w*, \w Hezron|strong="H2696"\w*, and \w Carmi|strong="H3756"\w*: these \add be\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*; \w Jemuel|strong="H3223"\w*, and \w Jamin|strong="H3226"\w*, and \w Ohad|strong="H0161"\w*, and \w Jachin|strong="H3199"\w*, and \w Zohar|strong="H6714"\w*, and \w Shaul|strong="H7586"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of a Canaanitish \w woman|strong="H3669"\w*: these \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Simeon|strong="H8095"\w*.

¶ And these \add are\add* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* according to their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*; \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w*, and \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, and \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*: and the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w life|strong="H2416"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* \add were\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.
The \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Gershon|strong="H1648"\w*; \w Libni|strong="H3845"\w*, and \w Shimi|strong="H8096"\w*, according to their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*; \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*, and \w Izhar|strong="H3324"\w*, and \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*, and \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*: and the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w life|strong="H2416"\w* of \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w* \add were\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*; \w Mahali|strong="H4249"\w* and \w Mushi|strong="H4187"\w*: these \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w* according to their \w generations|strong="H8435"\w*.

And \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* him \w Jochebed|strong="H3115"\w* his \w father’s sister|strong="H1733"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*; and she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: and the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* of the \w life|strong="H2416"\w* of \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w* \add were\add* an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* and \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.
¶ And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Izhar|strong="H3324"\w*; \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*, and \w Nepheg|strong="H5298"\w*, and \w Zichri|strong="H2147"\w*.
And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Uzziel|strong="H5816"\w*; \w Mishael|strong="H4332"\w*, and \w Elzaphan|strong="H0469"\w*, and \w Zithri|strong="H5644"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* him \w Elisheba|strong="H0472"\w*, \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Amminadab|strong="H5992"\w*, \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* of \w Naashon|strong="H5177"\w*, to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*; and she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w*, and \w Abihu|strong="H0030"\w*, \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w*, and \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*.

And the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w*; \w Assir|strong="H0617"\w*, and \w Elkanah|strong="H0511"\w*, and \w Abiasaph|strong="H0023"\w*: these \add are\add* the \w families|strong="H4940"\w* of the \w Korhites|strong="H7145"\w*.

And \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* him \add one\add* of the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Putiel|strong="H6317"\w* to \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*; and she \w bare|strong="H3205"\w* him \w Phinehas|strong="H6372"\w*: these \add are\add* the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* according to their \w families|strong="H4940"\w*.

\w These|strong="H1931"\w* \add are\add* that \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* and \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, to \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Bring \w out|strong="H3318"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* according to their \w armies|strong="H6635"\w*.

\w These|strong="H1992"\w* \add are\add* they which \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* to \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, to bring \w out|strong="H3318"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* from \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*: these \add are\add* that \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*.

¶ And it came to pass on the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add when\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*,

That the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* unto \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, I \add am\add* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* thou unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* all that I \w say|strong="H1696"\w* unto thee.

And \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, Behold, I \add am\add* of \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* \w lips|strong="H8193"\w*, and how shall \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto me?
